resultDescription.name: OS Release Version
resultDescription.info:
The possibility of vulnerability is
low if the latest version of Android

resultDescription.name: Device Lock
resultDescription.info:
For any activity to be performed,
the Android smartphone has be unlocked.

resultDescription.name: Installation from unknown sources
resultDescription.info:
The possibility of vulnerability is
installation is allowed only from Google Play

low if no suspicious apps are present

resultDescription.name: Unlocked Bootloader
resultDescription.info:
If the bootloader is locked Android OS
does not allow to load unverified or untrusted
third-party recovery software or Android OS.

resultDescription.name: Basic Integrity Test
resultDescription.info:
Its a rigorous test which tells the
